subject: [Wordfence Alert] Problems found on mets.edu.au/stage1
preview: This email was sent from your website "METS Training Services" by the Wordfence plugin. Wordfence found the following new issues on "METS Training Services" (2 existing issues were also found again).

full_threads.body:
This email was sent from your website "METS Training Services" by the Wordfence plugin.

Wordfence found the following new issues on "METS Training Services" (2 existing issues were also found again).

Alert generated at Wednesday 17th of September 2025 at 03:18:53 PM


See the details of these scan results on your site at: https://mets.edu.au/stage1/wp-admin/admin.php?page=WordfenceScan

Medium Severity Problems:

* The Plugin "Elementor" needs an upgrade (3.31.3 -> 3.32.1).

https://wordpress.org/plugins/elementor/#developers

* The Plugin "Hostinger Tools" needs an upgrade (3.0.48 -> 3.0.50).

https://wordpress.org/plugins/hostinger/#developers

* The Plugin "Popup Maker" needs an upgrade (1.20.6 -> 1.21.1).

https://wordpress.org/plugins/popup-maker/#developers

* The Plugin "JetElements For Elementor" needs an upgrade (2.7.9.1 -> 2.7.10.1).

/#developers

* The Plugin "JetEngine" needs an upgrade (3.7.3 -> 3.7.5).

/#developers

* The Plugin "JetSearch" needs an upgrade (3.5.12 -> 3.5.13).

/#developers

* The Plugin "Ultimate Addons for Elementor Pro" needs an upgrade (1.40.2 -> 1.40.4).

http://ultimateelementor.com/pricing/?utm_source=license-form&utm_medium=uael-purchase&utm_campaign=graupi-license-form/#developers

* The Plugin "Elementor Pro" needs an upgrade (3.31.3 -> 3.32.0).

https://elementor.com/pro/changelog/#developers

2 existing issues were found again and are not shown.
